repository.description: The repository to which the pull request belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier of the pull request.

node_id.description: The node ID of the pull request.

number.description: The number of the pull request.

merged.description: Indicates if the pull request has been merged.

mergeable.description: Indicates if the pull request is mergeable.

can_be_rebased.description: Indicates whether the pull request can be rebased onto the base branch.

merge_state_status.description: The status of the merge state for the pull request.

merged_by.description: The user who merged the pull request.

login.description: The username of the user who merged the pull request.

id.description: The unique identifier of the user who merged the pull request.

node_id.description: The node ID of the user who merged the pull request.

avatar_url.description: The URL of the avatar of the user who merged the pull request.

html_url.description: The HTML URL of the user who merged the pull request.

type.description: The type of user who merged the pull request.

site_admin.description: Indicates if the user who merged the pull request is a site admin.

comments.description: The total number of comments on the pull request.

review_comments.description: The total number of review comments on the pull request.

maintainer_can_modify.description: Indicates if maintainers can modify the pull request.

commits.description: The total number of commits in the pull request.

additions.description: The total number of lines added in the pull request.

deletions.description: The total number of lines deleted in the pull request.

changed_files.description: The number of files changed in the pull request.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the pull request was last updated.
